has research problem.from sentence: A Question - Focused Multi- Factor Attention Network for Question Answering
Neural network models recently proposed for question answering ( QA ) primarily focus on capturing the passagequestion relation .
They also do not explicitly focus on the question and answer type which often plays a critical role in QA .

has research problem: machine comprehension - based ( MC ) question answering ( QA )

has research problem.from sentence: In machine comprehension - based ( MC ) question answering ( QA ) , a machine is expected to provide an answer for a given question by understanding texts .
